title: Lesser Restoration Potion
summaries: The Lesser Restoration Potion is a potion that has the effects of both the Lesser Healing Potion and Lesser Mana Potion.

On the [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, they are no longer craftable and have instead been replaced by the Restoration Potion. However, they can still be found inside Shadow Chests in The Underworld.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, they are removed partially, and are replaced with Restoration Potions when cheated through inventory editors.
